column4: let me try again, I recently installed ubuntu, i made my / partition too small and now im needing to make it larger. How do I go about doing this?

well, im not completely new, ive been using ubuntu off and on for years.... i tried gparted but i was only able to reduce my /home partition to create unallocated space... however im unable to do anything with it
You'll have to run LiveCD.  You can't partition the HDD you're actively using.
